rationale: Replace insecure MD5 digest with SHA-256 to maintain a signature while avoiding known collision vulnerabilities.
patch:
* Begin Patch
* Update File: /Users/justinexue/Downloads/flask-todo-app/app.py
@@
- sig = hashlib.md5(title.encode()).hexdigest()
+ sig = hashlib.sha256(title.encode()).hexdigest()
* End Patch
